mapper.select: select * from new_book order by input_date desc
select * from new_book where book_title like #{book_title} order by book_title asc

select distinct c.lib_name, a.isbn13 , book_title, a.authors, a.description, a.publisher, a.pub_date, a.input_date from new_book as a inner join public_library as b on a.isbn13 = b.isbn13 inner join library_info as c on b.lib_code = c.lib_code where description != '' limit 20 offset 60
